overview_of_class: French 121-3 is the last quarter of a three-quarter course for students who have completed French 121-2 or have been placed in that course by the French department. The aim of the course is to develop students' communication skills and cultural knowledge. Class meets four times a week. To fulfill the Weinberg College language requirement, Northwestern day school students may not P/N the course and must pass 121-3 with a minimum grade of C-.
name: Intermediate French
class_attributes:
Attendance at 1st class mandatory

Prerequisites apply, see description
subject: FRENCH
